snippet: A lawyer for the mezzo-soprano Wendy White, who cannot perform since falling during a Metropolitan Opera production, says the company is refusing to honor her contract.
abstract: Veteran mezzo-soprano Wendy White, who fell from a platform during a Metropolitan Opera production in 2011, says in a lawsuit that she has still not recovered from her injuries and that the opera company is refusing to honor her contract.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for the mezzo-soprano Wendy White, who cannot perform since falling during a Metropolitan Opera production, says the company is refusing to honor her contract.

headline.seo: Wendy White Says Met Refuses to Pay Her After Injury
headline.main: Singer Who Fell at the Met Feels Doubly Hurt
headline.print_headline: Singer Who Fell at the Met Feels Doubly Hurt
